data.name: endpoint_select
data.label: OBS service connection info
data.description: Select a service extension point which type is IAM account

validation.required_message: Select the corresponding OBS service connection information. If no OBS service extension point exists, create a service extension point which type is IAM account

data.name: endpoint
data.label: OBS endpoint information
data.description: Please input your OBS endpoint info,refer to the link for details:https://developer.huaweicloud.com/intl/en-us/endpoint?OBS

extend_prop.show_placeholder: If your OBS is located in Huawei cn-north-4,please input:https://obs.cn-north4.myhuaweicloud.com

validation.required_message: OBS endpoint info cannot be empty

data.name: bucket
data.label: OBS bucket name
data.description: Please enter the name of the OBS bucket that you want to operate

extend_prop.show_placeholder: Please input your OBS bucket name

data.name: key
data.label: OBS file path in the bucket
data.description: Enter the path of the file to be uploaded to the OBS bucket

extend_prop.show_placeholder: The path of the uploaded file in the OBS bucket,such as /temp/.If the path does not exist, it is automatically created.

validation.required_message: The file path in the bucket cannot be empty

data.name: source_file
data.label: Path of the local file
data.description: Enter the path of the local file to be uploaded. The absolute path must be in the ${SHARE_PATH} path. A maximum of 10 matching paths are supported. Multiple paths must be separated

extend_prop.show_placeholder: Path of the file in the local environment, for example, /target/output/

validation.required_message: The local file path cannot be empty

data.name: self_folder
data.label: Include the folder itself
data.description: If you select Include, the current folder will be uploaded to obs. If you select not include, only the contents in the current folder will be uploaded
